title: Eclipse Neon
breadcrumbs: Version 2.1 New features, improvements and updates
text:
Eclipse Neon

devonfw comes with its own pre configured and enhanced Eclipse based IDE:  the Open Source "devonfw IDE" and "devonfw Distr" which falls under Capgemini IP. Weâ€™ve updated both versions to the latest stable version of Eclipse, Neon. From Balu onwards we support the IDE on Linux as well and we offer downloadable versions for both Windows and Linux.


See: The Devon IDE
